Interface INodeRMI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NodeRMI

    public interface INodeRMI
extends java.rmi.Remote

    • Method Summary

      Get number of records in the hashmap.

      Get the IP address corresponding to the given hash
      int getNext(java.lang.String userName)
      Get the hash of the node after the hash of the given name.
      int getPrevious(java.lang.String userName)
      Get the node with the hash before the hash of the given name.
      java.lang.String getPrevIp(java.lang.String filename)
      Get the file owner.
      int removeNode(int name)
      Remove a node.
